articles.author: Steve Keating
articles.title: Lightning zaps Canada's Stanley Cup dreams - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's Stanley Cup drought will continue for at least another year after the Tampa Bay Lightning beat the Montreal Canadiens 1-0 on Wednesday to cap a successful National Hockey League title defence and heap more misery on an ice hockey-mad nation.
articles.content: Fans react as they watch the end of game five of the NHL Stanley Cup Finals between the Montreal Canadiens and Tampa Bay Lightning ice hockey teams in Montreal, Quebec, Canada, July 7, 2021. REUTERS/… [+2364 chars]

articles.title: CANADA FX DEBT-Canadian dollar falls by most in 4 months as investors eye peak growth - Reuters.com

articles.author: Nichola Saminather
articles.title: UPDATE 1-Canada's Manulife hopes to tap into Asia's growth in wealth - Reuters
articles.description: Manulife Financial Corp has raised the proportion of core profit it aims to earn from its fastest-growing businesses, including asset management and its operations in Asia, where it hopes to capitalize on the continent's rapid growth in wealth.
articles.content:
(Adds comments from investor day, share price)
TORONTO, June 29 (Reuters) - Manulife Financial Corp has raised the proportion of core profit it aims to earn from its fastest-growing businesses, incl… [+2329 chars]

articles.author: Nichola Saminather, Sohini Podder
articles.title: Prudential sells retirement business to Great-West Lifeco in $3.51 billion deal - Reuters.com
articles.description: Canadian insurer Great-West Lifeco Inc (Lifeco) said on Wednesday its U.S. unit would buy Prudential Financial Inc's full-service retirement business for about C$4.45 billion ($3.51 billion) in one of its biggest deals yet as it accelerates its expansion.
